      • KM_PER_METERS

        private static float KM_PER_METERS

      • METERS_PER_KM

        private static float METERS_PER_KM

      • mMetricScaleChoices

        private static double[] mMetricScaleChoices
        These are the list of choices for the radius of the outer circle on the screen when using metric units. All items are in kilometers. This array is used to choose the scale of the radar display.

      • mMetricDisplayUnitsPerKm

        private static float[] mMetricDisplayUnitsPerKm
        Once the scale is chosen, this array is used to convert the number of kilometers on the screen to an integer. (Note that for short distances we use meters, so we multiply the distance by METERS_PER_KM. (This array is for metric measurements.)

      • mMetricDisplayFormats

        private static java.lang.String[] mMetricDisplayFormats
        This array holds the formatting string used to display the distance to the target. (This array is for metric measurements.)

      • mMetricScaleFormats

        private static java.lang.String[] mMetricScaleFormats
        This array holds the formatting string used to display the distance on each ring of the radar screen. (This array is for metric measurements.)

      • KM_PER_YARDS

        private static float KM_PER_YARDS

      • KM_PER_MILES

        private static float KM_PER_MILES

      • YARDS_PER_KM

        private static float YARDS_PER_KM

      • MILES_PER_KM

        private static float MILES_PER_KM

      • mEnglishScaleChoices

        private static double[] mEnglishScaleChoices
        These are the list of choices for the radius of the outer circle on the screen when using standard units. All items are in kilometers. This array is used to choose the scale of the radar display.

      • mEnglishDisplayUnitsPerKm

        private static float[] mEnglishDisplayUnitsPerKm
        Once the scale is chosen, this array is used to convert the number of kilometers on the screen to an integer. (Note that for short distances we use meters, so we multiply the distance by YARDS_PER_KM. (This array is for standard measurements.)

      • mEnglishDisplayFormats

        private static java.lang.String[] mEnglishDisplayFormats
        This array holds the formatting string used to display the distance to the target. (This array is for standard measurements.)

      • mEnglishScaleFormats

        private static java.lang.String[] mEnglishScaleFormats
        This array holds the formatting string used to display the distance on each ring of the radar screen. (This array is for standard measurements.)

        private Location mNetworkLocation
        The last location reported by the network provider. Use this if we can't get a location from GPS

      • setTarget

        public void setTarget(int latE6,
                      int lonE6)
        Sets the target to track on the radar
        Parameters:
        latE6 - Latitude of the target, multiplied by 1,000,000
        lonE6 - Longitude of the target, multiplied by 1,000,000

      • setUseMetric

        public void setUseMetric(boolean useMetric)
        Update state to reflect whether we are using metric or standard units.
        Parameters:
        useMetric - True if the display should use metric units

      • updateDistance

        private void updateDistance(double distanceKm)
        Update our state to reflect a new distance to the target. This may require choosing a new scale for the radar rings.
        Parameters:
        distanceKm - The new distance to the target

      • startSweep

        public void startSweep()
        Turn on the sweep animation starting with the next draw

        Turn off the sweep animation
